context:
Beads description:
Navigation list with clickable rows. Each row has: icon/thumbnail (left), title + optional description (center), chevron accessory (right). Use cases: settings pages, mobile app menus, feature indexes, dashboard navigation. Distinct from sidebar-nav - these are standalone navigational rows.
